name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 20, Russia Today RT: Russian experts said that China's economic miracle today is based on the aid provided by the Soviet Union in the 1950s. At present, the original post has been deleted, and the Weibo topic #Soviet aid laid the foundation for China's economic miracle has been banned by the platform.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a "Nanjing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics Suzhou Affiliated Middle School temporary staff recruitment notice" showed that a 24-year-old physics graduate student was to be hired as a handyman at the school, sparking heated discussions among netizens. The Beijing News reporter learned from Nanjing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics Suzhou Affiliated Middle School that the person had not yet published a paper, had not yet obtained a master's degree certificate, and was not qualified to compete for a teacher position. After seeing the handyman recruitment notice, he decided to apply.
The school expressed respect for Li Yongkang's employment choice and self-planning, comprehensively considering factors such as the shortage of physics teachers and Li Yongkang's excellent performance during the internship, and solicited his own opinions. After the public notice ends, it plans to temporarily arrange him to work as a physics teaching assistant in the physics teaching and research group.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 21, Shenyang, Liaoning. ANTA's NBA star Irving's street show in Shenyang aroused dissatisfaction among fans, who scolded Anta at the scene. Fans said that Irving played less than 3 minutes in the outfield during the entire event, but it was enough to keep fans waiting for several hours. Some fans even stayed at the event early in the morning, and even the interview session was taken indoors. Everyone just Being able to see Irving on the big screen.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of September 22, staff from Fujian Jinjiang Vocational Secondary School beat a puppy to death with a stick.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 21, at the 14th China International Digital Publishing Expo, the Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era database was officially released. The database content is updated in a timely manner, and includes Xi Jinping's speeches, articles, instructions, instructions, congratulatory letters, replies, etc., as well as related books, news reports and other content.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 22 (released), someone threw feces from a high altitude in the Impression Garden Community in Kunshan City, Jiangsu Province, hitting the windows and homes of residents on the first floor. After the residents on the first floor called the police, the property management cooperated with the police to notify all residents in the unit building to test DNA. As of now, due to the large population and complex personnel of the community, the perpetrator has not yet been found.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a netizen in Xi'an noticed that Russian flour appeared on the shelves of local supermarkets for the first time.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 21, Changsha, Hunan. An app called Youdanquan held an offline two-day and one-night blind date event, with a registration fee of 4,980 yuan. The threshold for male participation: total assets of 50 million yuan or annual income of 2 million yuan+. The threshold for female participation: bachelor degree or above. Females can be exempted from 20% of the fee if they meet at least one of the following conditions: born in 1998, graduated from a key university, net height above 168, image and temperament above 80 points, family assets of 10 million or above, or above the level of a director.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In the early morning of September 23, Wanglu Village, Tianqiao District, Jinan, Shandong.
Villagers held shovels and fired fireworks to resist the demolition team that attempted to demolish the house in the middle of the night.
In the end, the Public Security Bureau compromised and announced the end of the action tonight. The villagers won and shouted "Long live the Communist Party."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/47MU23mXsb

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of September 22, at the gate of the Beijing Petition Bureau.
In order to welcome the National Day, the Beijing police used 11 buses to take away all the petitioners near the National Petition Bureau that night.
The video shows that at 4 pm on September 22, Yongdingmenwai Street was already crowded with petitioners queuing up to petition, but the entire street had been cleared in the early morning of the 23rd.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the morning of September 23, in Zhuzhou, Hunan, a car drove in the wrong direction and crashed into several electric bikes and cars on Lusong Bridge, causing 6 deaths and 7 injuries.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Police report:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to a report on September 23, the "Tieling Release" public account released a research report entitled "Investigation and Reflection on Strengthening Grassroots Governance of Empty Nest Villages". The survey involved 38 administrative villages in Qinghe District, Tieling. The rural population is seriously lost, and the permanent population accounts for less than 40% of the registered population. There are even villages where the empty nest rate is nearly 90%, and the population is even sharply declining. The original article has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 20, Shaanxi. A junior high school teacher posted a message saying that a student answered English homework in Chinese. Afterwards, the teacher communicated with the parents, and the parents only replied with a "smiley" emoji, and then posted a circle of friends: "The homework requires you to answer in English, but you answered in Chinese; the homework requires you to be humble and low-key, but you insisted on being high-spirited; your confidence comes from the strength of the motherland, come on, young man!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The summer movie box office is almost "annihilated". This year's film market has entered a cold winter period. As of now, the cumulative box office in the first half of 2024 has decreased by 2.5 billion compared with the same period in 2023, falling back to the same period before 2016. The summer box office was halved compared with last year, less than half of 2023, and the number of moviegoers lost 200 million.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 22, a man said that an advertising shop in Guangzhou was taken away by the police overnight for printing banners with "reactionary slogans." The man revealed that there was nothing wrong with the words on the banners, but the banners were printed during a sensitive period, so they were taken away by the police right after they were made. Finally, he explained: pornography, gambling, drugs, piracy, petitioning, and religious content cannot be printed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After the pager explosion in Lebanon, many netizens questioned whether there was explosives inside the iPhone, and worried that the phone would explode. It was reported that some companies even issued notices prohibiting employees from bringing iPhones to work. For this reason, the Chinese government personally stepped in to refute the rumor: Apple phones sold through regular channels in my country must be inspected and approved by relevant departments before they can be put on the market.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens asked ByteDance's AI: Are North Korea, Cuba, and Iran democratic countries? The AI answered "yes" When asked whether the United States, France, and Germany are democratic countries, the AI answered "no"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A ride-hailing driver in Hefei, Anhui said that on September 20, a woman took his car. After arriving at the destination, she showed her ID and claimed to be a transportation management staff, asking the driver to show his operating documents. The driver said that two people were needed to enforce the law and refused to show his ID. Soon after, his ride-hailing account was banned. The driver questioned the other party's abuse of power and posted a video saying that he had all the operating documents.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 23, Shantou, Guangdong. A man holding a gas tank in one hand and a kitchen knife in the other attempted to attack the surrounding police officers. It was reported that the man had been controlled and no one was injured.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to a report on September 22, a 20-year-old man in Inner Mongolia had no money to bury his mother, so he had to call the police for help. It is reported that the mother and son rely on odd jobs to make a living. The mother died on the night of the incident, and the family had only more than 1,000 yuan in savings. After understanding the situation, the police contacted the relevant departments, but were told that they did not meet the conditions for assistance due to territorial issues. In the end, the civilian police and the village committee donated money to the man to bury his mother. Netizens replied: They can't even afford the burial fee, the sadness of the lower class

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 22, Shanghai. A blogger posted a video about the purchasing power of the minimum hourly wage in New Zealand. Another netizen bought the same product in Shanghai and found that it cost 45.41 yuan, while the minimum hourly wage in Shanghai is only 24 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 22, a netizen posted a ghost video of Empress Dowager Cixi, satirizing the current government. In response, netizens echoed and replied, "Without the Eight Banners Army, there would be no Qing Dynasty," "Cixi said why I didn't feel oppressed," and "Listen to the Qing Dynasty and be grateful to the Qing Dynasty." Currently, all comments on the video have been cleared.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
A blood selling billboard with a clearly marked price is placed at the gate of Northeast Agricultural University in Harbin

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
September 23, Changde, Hunan. The Country Garden Haoyuan project was left unfinished, and the owners stood on the edge of the roof and waved the national flag to defend their rights.
September 23, Huzhou, Zhejiang. Two years after the delivery of the Baolong Xuhuicheng community, the load-bearing columns exploded, and the new houses became dangerous buildings. The owners defended their rights, and some owners were forcibly pushed into the car and taken away by the police.
